title: Update Firebase authDomain to use yourdomain.com

requirements.text: In frontend/src/firebase.ts, update the authDomain field in the firebaseConfig object to 'yourdomain.com'. Keep all other existing firebaseConfig values (apiKey, projectId, appId, etc.) and all existing exports (auth instance via getAuth, RecaptchaVerifier, signInWithPhoneNumber) unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The authDomain field in firebaseConfig in frontend/src/firebase.ts is set to 'yourdomain.com'.
All other firebaseConfig values remain unchanged.
All existing exports (auth, RecaptchaVerifier, signInWithPhoneNumber) remain intact and functional.
The app builds without errors after the change.

constraints: Do not modify any other firebaseConfig fields (apiKey, projectId, appId, etc.).
Do not alter the exported auth instance, RecaptchaVerifier, or signInWithPhoneNumber signatures.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Changing any other Firebase configuration or authentication logic.
Modifying App.tsx or any other component files.
Adding new features or UI changes.
